      • buildComputation

        public dk.alexandra.fresco.framework.DRes<java.lang.Integer> buildComputation​(dk.alexandra.fresco.framework.builder.numeric.ProtocolBuilderNumeric producer)
        Build each step of the computation, each step will be executed asynchronously. Inputs outputs and Comparison results can only be used in the next step, since only then the completion of their evaluation is guaranteed
        Specified by:
        buildComputation in interface dk.alexandra.fresco.framework.builder.Computation<java.lang.Integer,​dk.alexandra.fresco.framework.builder.numeric.ProtocolBuilderNumeric>
        Parameters:
        producer - The numeric protocol builder used to create the MPC protocol
        Returns:
        returns the Lambda function evaluating whether the deal could be made

      • RunComputation

        public static void RunComputation​(ATPManager.Function pricingFunction,
                                  java.lang.String[] args)
                           throws org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException
        Wrapper function to call the MPC Host computation. Allows to run the protocol in parallel. This brought no significant improvements while weakening our security guarantees.
        Parameters:
        pricingFunction - The function to evaluate the deal
        args - the command line arguments to setup the framework and the computation
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException - Exception thrown when arguments could not be processed.

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException
        The main entry point for the host. The params are parsed from the cmd line but could also be constructed in a different manner. The application is run in the computation runner, enabling for multithreaded execution (only faster, if the set of ATPUnits can be separated)
        Parameters:
        args - The command line arguments used to initiate the IFXHost object
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException - Throws a parse exception if an unexpected value occured or if something necessary is missing
